EBNF variant.description: Declares the flavor (or syntax-variant) of the following EBNF-code. 'dhparser' is the default, 'classic' ist closest to the ISO-standard and 'heuristic' tries to guess the flavor.

Optimizations.description: Optimization level: 'all' yields slightly faster parsers (av. 20%), but parser will be a bit harder to debug.

Whitespace definition.description: Regular expression defining insignificant whitespace, example: /\s*/. Alternatively, one of the values horizontal, linefeed, vertical can be given.  'linefeed' means that a single linefeed, but not an empty sill counts as whitespace.

Surrounding whitespace for literals.description: Selects the side on which implicitly capture whitespace, possible values: right, left, both, none\default value: right. Only a single value is possible!

Ignore case.description: Small and capital letters are treated as the same, e.g. a parser for '<image>' also matches '<IMAGE>'.

Syntax-Tree simplification level.description: Reduction level for simplifying the syntax tree while parsing. Possible levels: none, flatten, merge_treetops, merge

Early elimination of intermediary nodes.description: List of nodes that can be replaced by their child-nodes or redcued to their parent node, to simplify the syntax tree. Requires at least @tree_reduction = flatten!

Early dropping of irrelevant nodes.description: Selects which kind of nodes will be dropped from the conctrete syntax tree, already,  possible values: token, whitespace. Both values can be specified. Empty anonymous nodes and anonymous nodes with a single child will always be eliminated.

Preprocessor token declaration.description: Declare the names of the tokens that an (optional) preprocessor emits.

Error message substitution.description: Error Message that shall be emitted if a mandatory (ยง) element is missed while parsing SYMBOL, but the regular expression matches the following text.

Skip to next legitimate value after pars.description: Specifies a reentry-point where parser SYMBOL continues if a mandatory (ยง) element was missing.

Resume after parsing failed.description: Specifies a reentry-point where the parser calling parser SYMBOL continues if parser SYMBOL misses a mandatory (ยง) element.

Filter captured symbols.description: Name of a Python-filter-function that is applied when retrieving a stored symbol. (DHParser-extension to EBNF)
